kop warthawa idiripath wimen pasu parlimenthu sankirnaye ada pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin mahajana eksath peramune nayaka, parlimenthu manthri dinesh gunawardhana me bawa kiya sitiya.adala siddhiya mul karagena agramathya ranil wikramasinha pilibandawa da purna parikshanayak sidukala yuthu bawayi madhya hamuwata ekwemin parlimenthu manthri mahindananda aluthgamage kiya sitiye.mahabanku bandumkara siddhiyen ratata biliyana 125kata wadi alabhayak siduwi athi bawa da madhya hamuwata ekwu parlimenthu manthri bandula gunawardhana kiya sitiya.salasumsahagatha lesa mema mahabanku bandumkara ganudenuwa sidukara athi bawayi parlimenthu manthri keheliya rambaukwalla madhya hamuwata ekwemin kiya sitiye.
nimal samadama ee paya thula janelayen eliye wana siddhi wisthara karanawa.

eeth aththa eeka noweyi.gahaniya pirimiyagen pidawata pathwena awastha wagema eeke anik paththath thibenawa.ee paththa kawuruwath katha karanne na.pirimiya hamadama thamange pidawa dathmitikagena iwasanna oona.me prashna waladi anthimata waradikaraya wenne pirimiya.kantha sanwidhana wisin dawantha adhipathi mathawadayak hadala.kanthawak pidawata pathwenawa kiyala telidrama ekak haduwath aadharadenna porakanawa.pitarata enji oo walin.aththatama duppathath pidithayath pirimiyayi.antharjathika pragdhanaya sthriwadiwa yodawana nisa pirimiya wahalek lesayi inna wenne.gunadasa kapuge ge sinduwak mathak wenawa."kura kuhumbau minisa wemi ma obe mandire" antharjathika pragdhanayen aadya sanwidhanathmaka sthriwadaya nisa pirimiya asarana wela.thamange bharyawa me kathawe thibenawa wage anacharaye hasirunoth kisima pirimiyekuta galawillak na.ohuta happenna wenne loku balawega ekka.mewa kisima pirimiyek danne na.sthriwadayata pakshawa koment dammath thamange birida awi osawanne nathithakkal owun surakshithayi.eheth owunge hisata udinuth kaduwak ellalayi thibenne.me ek kathawak witharayi.mehema katha dasa das gananak ape samajaye thibenawa.samajaye janapriya karawala thibena thawa kathawak thamayi nandamma lelita hirihara karanawa kiyana eka.namuth wadipurama siduwenne leli nandammata hirihara karanawa kiyana eka.hugak piriminge demawupiyo papuwe amaru hadilama marila thibenawa.eeth en ji oo walin mathurannema lelita hinsanaya thibenawa kiyana eka.nikam balanna lelila wisin pannala dapu samiyage demawupiyi wissak wath eka gamaka nadda kiyala.polisiya pariwasaya oya hama thanakadima wachikawa ha kayikawa hinsanayata lak wenne pirimiya.samaharawita pirimiyage demawupiyo.namuth me kathawa kisi kenek kiyanne na.eeka pirimikamata lajjawaklu.mokakda me pirimikama kiyana wihiluwa?.thamange demawupiyanta gani hirihara karana kota wiruddha wenna wath bari nam mokakda me samaje.hama madhyama pirimiyata wiruddhanam ee samaje samajikathwayen athi wade mokakda?nihada bahutharaya sanwidhanathmaka sulutharaye hondama sangayaya kiyala kathawak thibenawa.mata nam ba dushtakame sangayek wenna.mage yaluwo innawa kasada badinne na ganigen ammata wenaskam weyi kiyala.hamadema nithiyayi okkoma ganunge paththa ganna eka asadharanayi neda?eeken samahara wita wakrakarawa ganuma pidawata path wenawa.dan nirmanaya wela thibena sthriwadi watapitawa nisa koyi paththen baluwath pirimiya pidawata pathwenawa,waradikaraya wenawa.katha karanna kenekuth na.koment eka diga wuna.sori hode.
